amendment.description: To amend the Congressional Budget and Impoundment Control Act of 1974 to limit the phasein of revenue-reducing measures to 1 year.

vote.text: Amendment SA 616 not agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 616 proposed by Senator Dayton. (consideration: CR S6440) To amend the Congressional Budget and Impoundment Control Act of 1974 to limit the phasein of revenue-reducing measures to 1 year.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 616 not agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 616 proposed by Senator Dayton.
